thread.title: India’s Modi Expresses Support for Climate-Change Agreement
thread.title_full: India’s Modi Expresses Support for Climate-Change Agreement - WSJ

author: Carol E. Lee
title: India’s Modi Expresses Support for Climate-Change Agreement
text:
UNITED NATIONS—Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi expressed support for an international climate-change agreement U.S. President Barack Obama is working to secure, but stopped short of making new pledges for reducing carbon emissions ahead of a December meeting of world leaders in Paris.
Messrs. Obama and Modi met Monday on the sidelines of the United Nations General Assembly, their third meeting in the past year.
Mr. Obama,...
